page.t: Place a navigation beacon at a data vault
No stations are available to restock navigation beacons.
There are no or not enough navigation beacons available, and restocking of navigation beacons is disabled.
We don't have enough funds to restock navigation beacons.
The creation of the restocking order has failed.
We haven't found any data vaults that we can reach or need to mark.
All available stations currently do not have enough resources to manufacture navigation beacons.
This script allows your ship to place navigation beacons beside data vaults throughout the galaxy.
